text: Gabriela Dabrowski and Rohan Bopanna won the Mixed Doubles tennis title at the 2017 French Open, defeating Anna-Lena Grönefeld and Robert Farah in the final, 2–6, 6–2, [12–10]. Martina Hingis and Leander Paes were the defending champions, but lost in the first round to Katarina Srebotnik and Raven Klaasen. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== ==External links== *2017 French Open – Doubles draws and results at the International Tennis Federation mixed Category:2017 ATP World Tour Category:2017 WTA Tour 2017
title: 2017 French Open – Mixed Doubles
